translations: n．政体，政治组织：一个国家或其他政治实体的政治组织和管理方式。
· The polities of different countries vary greatly.
不同国家的政体差别很大。

sentences.sentence: During the following years, he took a more active part in polities.
sentences.translation: 在接下来的几年里，他更加积极地参加政治活动。

sentences.sentence: The properties of the optimal inventory polities of te EOQ model are discussed and the explicit solutions of the optimal inventory policy are also given.
sentences.translation: 讨论了该模型最优策略的性质，并给出了最优库存策略精确解的显式计算公式。
